Platform: PlayStation 3

Also available on: PS2 Wii X360
Released: USA October 2010, Spain in March 2011
MSRP:?
Recommended age (ESRB): 10

Desripcion:
-----------------
In the debut of version Dance Dance Revolution for PlayStation 3, gamers will find the game offers much more than follow the arrows with their feet. In this iteration of DDR, players can use both hands and feet at the same time, through PlayStation Move and mat controller, providing more rhythmic dancing, but realistic! This feature makes it a truly interactive experience of dance. In addition, compatibility with the PlayStation Eye allows the player and dance to the screen.

The incorporation of PlayStation Move lets players to customize the screen that includes features such as filtering effects, enlargement and reduction, capture and control of the particles on the screen to decorate your dance and then record what the user has created. Players can put their creativity to the fullest potential by loading the line dance and recorded video networks social media. The recorded video can be uploaded to YouTube and Facebook through video editor and rose from the PlayStation3 to share with friends and other fans of DDR.
